title: Ep. 1022 - The Crisis Is The Point
description:
The World Bank warns of the sharpest economic slowdown in 80 years, the Democrats tell Americans hurting at the pump to buy electric cars, and pro-abortion activists attack a pro-life pregnancy center in New York.

Watch Matt Walsh’s new Daily Wire original documentary “What Is A Woman?” at whatisawoman.com. 

Join Michael and the Daily Wire for Backstage Live At The Ryman on June 29th. Get your tickets now: https://utm.io/uezFr

I’m exposing the most successful failure in government history. Stream Fauci Unmasked here: https://utm.io/ueogL 

—
